s0311: Even birds and beasts know to avoid injustice, how much more so I!
s0312: Thus returned and rested in Zou village, composed the Zou melody to mourn him.
s0313: Then returned to Wei, entered and stayed at Qu Bo Yu's home.
s0314: Another day, Ling Gong asked about military formations.
s0315: Confucius said: 'Ritual matters I have heard of, military matters I have not studied.'
s0316: The next day, spoke with Confucius, saw flying geese, gazed up at them, his color was not on Confucius.
s0317: Confucius thus departed, returned to Chen.
s0318: Summer, Wei Ling Gong died, established grandson Jie, who became Wei Chu Gong.
s0319: Sixth month, Zhao Yang brought crown prince Kuai Kui inside Qi.
s0320: Yang Hu made the crown prince wear mourning clothes, eight people in mourning attire, falsely as those welcoming from Wei, crying as they entered, thus resided there.
s0321: Winter, Cai moved to Zhou Lai.
s0322: This year was Lu Ai Gong's third year, Confucius was sixty years old.
s0323: Qi helped Wei besiege Qi because crown prince Kuai Kui was there.
s0324: Summer, Lu Huan Xi temple burned, Nan Gong Jing Shu saved the fire.
s0325: Confucius in Chen heard of it, said: 'The disaster must be at Huan Xi temple?'
s0327: Autumn, Ji Huan Zi fell ill and was carried to view Lu's city walls. He sighed deeply, saying: 'In the past this state was nearly prosperous, but because I offended Confucius, it did not prosper.'
s0328: Looking back at his heir Kang Zi said: 'I will die soon, you must govern Lu;
s0329: governing Lu, must summon Zhong Ni.'
s0330: After several days, Huan Zi died, Kang Zi succeeded.
s0331: After burial, wished to summon Zhong Ni.
s0332: Gong Yu Yu said: 'In the past our former lord employed him but not to the end, finally became the laughingstock of the feudal lords.
s0333: Now employing him again, if cannot finish, this is again becoming the laughingstock of the feudal lords.'
s0334: Kang Zi said: 'Then who can be summoned?'
s0336: Thus sent envoys to summon Ran Qiu.
s0337: Ran Qiu about to go, Confucius said: 'Lu people summon Qiu, not for small use, will greatly use him.'
s0338: That day, Confucius said: 'Return home! Return home!
s0339: My party's youths are ardent and simple, their patterns are brilliant, I do not know how to cut them.'
s0340: Zi Gong knew Confucius wished to return, sent Ran Qiu, admonishing to 'if employed, use Confucius as the banner.'
s0341: Ran Qiu having left, next year, Confucius from Chen moved to Cai.
s0342: Cai Zhao Gong about to go to Wu, Wu summoned him.
s0343: Previously Zhao Gong deceived his ministers to move Zhou Lai, now about to go, ministers feared he would move again, Gong Sun Pian shot and killed Zhao Gong.
s0346: Next year, Confucius from Cai went to Ye.
s0347: Ye Gong asked about governance, Confucius said: 'Governance lies in attracting the distant and attaching the near.'
s0348: Another day, Ye Gong asked Confucius to Zi Lu, Zi Lu did not answer.
s0349: Confucius heard of it, said: 'You, why not answer saying "His character is: studies the Way without tiring, teaches others without wearying, becomes indignant and forgets food, joyful and forgets worry, does not know old age is approaching" thus.'
s0352: Chang Ju and Jie Ni were plowing together, Confucius considered them recluses, sent Zi Lu to ask for directions.
s0353: Chang Ju said: 'That one holding the reins, who is he?'
s0358: Jie Ni told Zi Lu: 'Who are you?'
